document.full_text: egypt ordered ousted president hosni mubarak detained for 15 days on wednesday for questioning into accusations he abused power during his 30-year rule, embezzled funds and had protesters killed.
document.title: egypt's mubarak detained, army wins protest respite
lines_and_colors: egypt ordered ousted president hosni mubarak detained for 15 days on wednesday for questioning into accusations he abused power during his 30-year rule, embezzled funds and had protesters killed.
